alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pine County through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Duxbury, or 20 miles northeast of Hinckley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Duxbury around 635 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
